name: Loop

values.name: until
values.comment:
Repeatedly apply a function to a value *until* a predicate holds.

    until (\ n -> n > 10) ((+) 5) 2 == 12

values.name: while
values.comment:
Repeatedly apply a function to a value *while* a predicate holds.

    while (\ n -> n < 10) ((+) 5) 2 == 12
